\vspace{13pt}
\textbf{Research Interests}\\
\rule[0.5ex]{1\linewidth}{1pt}

\vspace{-8pt}

Low-Mach-number flows, Pressure Projection Methods, Modified Equations,
Machine Learning, Computational Fluid Dynamics, Simulation Science
.
